body_html:
I downloaded everything a couple of hours ago. Bazel 0.10.0 was published today. I am using ubuntu 14.04

`(venv) jitoledo@CVC203:~/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow$ bazel build
ERROR: /home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE:15:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE", line 15
closure_repositories()
File "/home/jitoledo/.cache/bazel/_bazel_jitoledo/29f20a808e018d60d9e350b4366f4703/external/io_bazel_rules_closure/closure/repositories.bzl", line 69, in closure_repositories
_check_bazel_version("Closure Rules", "0.4.5")
File "/home/jitoledo/.cache/bazel/_bazel_jitoledo/29f20a808e018d60d9e350b4366f4703/external/io_bazel_rules_closure/closure/repositories.bzl", line 172, in _check_bazel_version
fail(("%s requires Bazel >=%s but was...)))
Closure Rules requires Bazel >=0.4.5 but was 0.10.0
ERROR: Error evaluating WORKSPACE file
ERROR: /home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE:41:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE", line 41
tf_workspace()
File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 48, in tf_workspace
check_version("0.5.4")
File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 38, in check_version
fail("\nCurrent Bazel version is {}, ...))

Current Bazel version is 0.10.0, expected at least 0.5.4
ERROR: Error evaluating WORKSPACE file
ERROR: error loading package 'external': Package 'external' contains errors
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.127s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (0 packages loaded)
(venv) jitoledo@CVC203:~/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow$
`

body:
I downloaded everything a couple of hours ago. Bazel 0.10.0 was published today. I am using ubuntu 14.04

`(venv) jitoledo@CVC203:~/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow$ bazel build
ERROR: /home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE:15:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
        File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE", line 15
                closure_repositories()
        File "/home/jitoledo/.cache/bazel/_bazel_jitoledo/29f20a808e018d60d9e350b4366f4703/external/io_bazel_rules_closure/closure/repositories.bzl", line 69, in closure_repositories
                _check_bazel_version("Closure Rules", "0.4.5")
        File "/home/jitoledo/.cache/bazel/_bazel_jitoledo/29f20a808e018d60d9e350b4366f4703/external/io_bazel_rules_closure/closure/repositories.bzl", line 172, in _check_bazel_version
                fail(("%s requires Bazel >=%s but was...)))
Closure Rules requires Bazel >=0.4.5 but was 0.10.0
ERROR: Error evaluating WORKSPACE file
ERROR: /home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE:41:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
        File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/WORKSPACE", line 41
                tf_workspace()
        File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 48, in tf_workspace
                check_version("0.5.4")
        File "/home/jitoledo/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl", line 38, in check_version
                fail("\nCurrent Bazel version is {}, ...))

Current Bazel version is 0.10.0, expected at least 0.5.4
ERROR: Error evaluating WORKSPACE file
ERROR: error loading package 'external': Package 'external' contains errors
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.127s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (0 packages loaded)
(venv) jitoledo@CVC203:~/install_tensorflow_sources/tensorflow$
`
